Feb 21, 23:44 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/02/2024 10:00 UTC
End time : 22/02/2024 17:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : : This maintenance is scheduled to upgrade all clusters with a policy update configured by the customer to ALWAYS UPDATE (through the API OVHcloud console) or to MAXIMUM SECURITY (through the Manager UI interface).
With this maintenance, we will upgrade all concerned MKS services to the latest patch version provided by our team. For more details, please refer to the documentation

Our engineers are working to resolve the situation.
Furthermore details will be provided as soon as possible.
